attributes.category: Health Care Professional/Association - Other Health Care Professional
attributes.comment:
I encourage CMS to reject the proposal for a National Healthcare Provider Directory on the grounds that a healthcare professional's actual biological sex could be obscured by ideologically defined attributes of gender identity and sex.

Gender identity is not evidence-based. Please see the attached scholarly review article for clarification about this. Furthermore, the proposed attributes of Clinical Sex, Clinical Gender, Sex Assigned at Birth, and Legal Sex are all subject to interpretation and manipulation.

Patient safety and patient trust in medical professionals depends on being able to make care decisions based on objective information and material reality.

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
